aboutpara: I graduated from UBIT (University of Karachi) in 2022 with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science. Currently, I am working as a Trainee Software Engineer at Tixsee Labs, where I'm honring my skills in full stack web development through hands-on practice. Alongside my professional commitments, I am also an active freelancer, leveraging my expertise to create impactful solutions. I have a keen interest in DevOps and Blockchain technologies, which further fuels my passion for innovation and growth
